analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ACATokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0xb68a47aee7b6b79d203125eece1eef8ff19cbf3e.sol#726-745):
	External calls:
	- _forwardFunds() (/unique_chucks/24/0xb68a47aee7b6b79d203125eece1eef8ff19cbf3e.sol#742-744)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentStage (/unique_chucks/24/0xb68a47aee7b6b79d203125eece1eef8ff19cbf3e.sol#744-745)

Reentrancy in ACATokenSale.finalize (/unique_chucks/24/0xb68a47aee7b6b79d203125eece1eef8ff19cbf3e.sol#710-717):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_chucks/24/0xb68a47aee7b6b79d203125eece1eef8ff19cbf3e.sol#714)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/24/0xb68a47aee7b6b79d203125eece1eef8ff19cbf3e.sol#716)

ACAToken.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/24/0xb68a47aee7b6b79d203125eece1eef8ff19cbf3e.sol#352-357) does not use the value returned by external calls:
